CreateProxySessionKillTask.document: This API is used to create an async task of killing all proxy node connection sessions and is currently supported only for Redis. The async task ID is the returned value, which can be passed to the API `DescribeProxySessionKillTasks` as a parameter to query the execution status of the session killing task.
CreateProxySessionKillTask.name: Creates a task of killing proxy node sessions

DescribeDBDiagEvents.document: This API is used to obtain the diagnosis event list in a specified time period by risk level, instance ID, etc.
DescribeDBDiagEvents.name: Obtains diagnosis event list

DescribeDiagDBInstances.document: This API is used to get the instance information list. Please always select Guangzhou for `Region`.
DescribeDiagDBInstances.name: Gets instance information list

DescribeMySqlProcessList.document: This API is used to query the real-time thread list of a relational database.
DescribeMySqlProcessList.name: Queries the list of real-time threads

DescribeProxySessionKillTasks.document: This API is used to query the result of the session killing task executed by the Redis proxy node. The async task ID (an input parameter) is obtained after the API `CreateProxySessionKillTask` is successfully called. Currently, the only valid value of `product` is `redis`.
DescribeProxySessionKillTasks.name: Queries the status of the session killing task executed by the proxy node

DescribeRedisTopKeyPrefixList.document: This API is used to query the list of top key prefixes for Redis instances.
DescribeRedisTopKeyPrefixList.name: Queries the list of top key prefixes for Redis instances

DescribeSlowLogUserHostStats.document: This API is used to get the statistical distribution chart of slow log source addresses.
DescribeSlowLogUserHostStats.name: Gets the statistical distribution chart of slow log source addresses

DescribeTopSpaceSchemas.document: This API is used to get the real-time space statistics of top databases of an instance. The returned results are sorted by size by default.
DescribeTopSpaceSchemas.name: Gets the space statistics of top databases

DescribeUserSqlAdvice.document: This API is used to get SQL statement optimization suggestions. It is free of charge for a limited time and will be charged after DBbrain is commercialized.
DescribeUserSqlAdvice.name: Gets SQL statement optimization suggestions

members.document: Service type. Valid value: `redis` (TencentDB for Redis).
members.name: Product

members.document: Async task ID that is returned after the session killing task is created.
members.name: AsyncRequestId

members.document: The unique request ID, which is returned for each request. RequestId is required for locating a problem.
members.name: RequestId

members.document: Start time in the format of “2021-05-27 00:00:00”. The earliest time that can be queried is 30 days before the current time.
members.name: StartTime

members.document: End time in the format of "2021-05-27 01:00:00". The interval between the end time and the start time can be up to 7 days.
members.name: EndTime

members.document: Risk level list. Valid values in descending order of severity: `1` (critical), `2` (serious), `3` (alarm), `4` (warning), `5` (healthy).
members.name: Severities

members.document: Number of returned results. Default value: 20. Maximum value: 50.
members.name: Limit

members.document: The unique request ID, which is returned for each request. RequestId is required for locating a problem.
members.name: RequestId

members.document: Whether it is an instance supported by DBbrain. It is fixed to `true`.
members.name: IsSupported

members.document: Service type. Valid values: mysql (TencentDB for MySQL), cynosdb (TDSQL-C for MySQL). Default value: mysql.
members.name: Product

members.document: Status of all instance inspection. 0: all instance inspection enabled, 1: all instance inspection disabled.
members.name: DbScanStatus

members.document: The unique request ID, which is returned for each request. RequestId is required for locating a problem.
members.name: RequestId

members.document: Thread ID, which is used to filter the thread list.
members.name: ID

members.document: Thread operation account name, which is used to filter the thread list.
members.name: User

members.document: Thread operation host address, which is used to filter the thread list.
members.name: Host

members.document: Thread operation database, which is used to filter the thread list.
members.name: DB

members.document: Thread operation status, which is used to filter the thread list.
members.name: State

members.document: Thread execution type, which is used to filter the thread list.
members.name: Command

members.document: Minimum operation duration of the thread in seconds, which is used to filter the list of threads whose operation duration is greater than this value.
members.name: Time

members.document: Thread operation statement, which is used to filter the thread list.
members.name: Info

members.document: Number of returned results. Default value: 20.
members.name: Limit

members.document: Service type. Valid values: mysql (TencentDB for MySQL), cynosdb (TDSQL-C for MySQL). Default value: mysql.
members.name: Product

members.document: The unique request ID, which is returned for each request. RequestId is required for locating a problem.
members.name: RequestId

members.document: The async session killing task ID, which is obtained after the API `CreateProxySessionKillTask` is successfully called.
members.name: AsyncRequestIds

members.document: Service type. Valid value: `redis` (TencentDB for Redis).
members.name: Product

members.document: The unique request ID, which is returned for each request. RequestId is required for locating a problem.
members.name: RequestId

members.document: Date for query, such as `2021-05-27`. You can select a date as early as in the last 30 days for query.
members.name: Date

members.document: Service type. Valid value: `redis` (TencentDB for Redis).
members.name: Product

members.document: The number of queried items. Default value: `20`. Max value: `100`.
members.name: Limit

members.document: The unique request ID, which is returned for each request. RequestId is required for locating a problem.
members.name: RequestId

members.document: Start time of the time range in the format of yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm:ss, such as 2019-09-10 12:13:14.
members.name: StartTime

members.document: End time of the time range in the format of yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm:ss, such as 2019-09-10 12:13:14.
members.name: EndTime

members.document: Service type. Valid values: mysql (TencentDB for MySQL), cynosdb (TDSQL-C for MySQL). Default value: mysql.
members.name: Product

members.document: Detailed list of the proportion of slow logs from each source address.
members.name: Items

members.document: The unique request ID, which is returned for each request. RequestId is required for locating a problem.
members.name: RequestId

members.document: Number of returned top databases. Maximum value: 100. Default value: 20.
members.name: Limit

members.document: Field used to sort top databases. Valid values: DataLength, IndexLength, TotalLength, DataFree, FragRatio, TableRows, PhysicalFileSize (supported only by TencentDB for MySQL instances). For TencentDB for MySQL instances, the default value is `PhysicalFileSize`. For other database instances, the default value is `TotalLength`.
members.name: SortBy

members.document: Service type. Valid values: mysql (TencentDB for MySQL), cynosdb (TDSQL-C for MySQL). Default value: mysql.
members.name: Product

members.document: List of the returned space statistics of top databases.
members.name: TopSpaceSchemas

members.document: Timestamp (in seconds) of database space data collection points
members.name: Timestamp

members.document: The unique request ID, which is returned for each request. RequestId is required for locating a problem.
members.name: RequestId

members.document: Service type. Valid values: `mysql` (TencentDB for MySQL), `cynosdb` (TDSQL-C for MySQL), `dbbrain-mysql` (self-built MySQL). Default value: `mysql`.
members.name: Product

members.document: SQL statement optimization suggestions, which can be parsed into JSON arrays. If there is no need for optimization, the output will be empty.
members.name: Advices

members.document: Notes of SQL statement optimization suggestions, which can be parsed into String arrays. If there is no need for optimization, the output will be empty.
members.name: Comments

members.document: DDL information of related tables, which can be parsed into JSON arrays.
members.name: Tables

members.document: SQL execution plan, which can be parsed into JSON arrays. If there is no need for optimization, the output will be empty.
members.name: SqlPlan

members.document: Cost saving details after SQL statement optimization, which can be parsed into JSON arrays. If there is no need for optimization, the output will be empty.
members.name: Cost

members.document: The unique request ID, which is returned for each request. RequestId is required for locating a problem.
members.name: RequestId

members.document: Severity, which can be divided into 5 levels: 1: fatal, 2: severe, 3: warning, 4: notice, 5: healthy.
members.name: Severity

members.document:
Reserved field.
Note: this field may return null, indicating that no valid values can be obtained.
members.name: Metric

members.document: Whether to enable database inspection. Valid values: Yes, No.
members.name: DailyInspection

members.document: Whether to enable instance overview. Valid values: Yes, No.
members.name: OverviewDisplay

InstanceInfo.document: Queries the list of instances and returns their information.

members.document: TencentDB instance initialization flag. Valid values: 0 (not initialized), 1 (initialized).
members.name: InitFlag

members.document: Whether it is an instance supported by DBbrain.
members.name: IsSupported

members.document: Status of instance security audit log. Valid values: ON (enabled), OFF (disabled).
members.name: SecAuditStatus

members.document: Status of instance audit log. Valid values: ALL_AUDIT (full audit is enabled), RULE_AUDIT (rule audit is enabled), UNBOUND (audit is disabled).
members.name: AuditPolicyStatus

members.document: Running status of instance audit log. Valid values: normal (running), paused (suspension due to overdue payment).
members.name: AuditRunningStatus

RedisPreKeySpaceData.document: Space information of Redis key prefixes

members.document:
Total size in MB of physical files exclusive to all tables in the database.
Note: this field may return null, indicating that no valid values can be obtained.
members.name: PhysicalFileSize

SlowLogHost.document: Details of slow log source addresses.

members.document: Proportion (in %) of slow logs from this source address to the total number of slow logs.
members.name: Ratio

members.document: Number of slow logs from this source address.
members.name: Count

TaskInfo.document: Information about Redis session killing task status

members.document: List of all proxies of the current instance.
members.name: InstProxyList

members.document: Total number of proxies of the current instance.
members.name: InstProxyCount

members.document: Task status. Valid values: `created` (create), `chosen` (to be executed), `running` (being executed), `failed` (failed), and `finished` (completed).
members.name: TaskStatus

members.document: IDs of the proxies that have completed the session killing tasks.
members.name: FinishedProxyList

members.document: IDs of the proxies that failed to execute the session killing tasks.
members.name: FailedProxyList
